contextId.occurrenceNote: This simile emphasizes the great number of Israelites. Alternate translation: "countless people" or "very many people" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-simile]])
contextId.glQuote: a people as numerous as the dust of the earth

contextId.occurrenceNote: The people of the army are compared to sheep that have no one to lead them because their shepherd, the king, has died. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-simile]])
contextId.glQuote: like sheep who have no shepherd
